myserver
Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
  myserver.ServerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ServerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Represents server controler of server. Inludes metodes for working with server cache. Singleton design pattern is used implementing this class.

groups - string representation of direcrtory with groups files.
autosync - boolean representation of synchronization mode.
